name: Ninja Cube (whitecliffgames)
description:
Ninja Dice! Use the arrow keys to navigate a board, taking turns with enemy cubes. The face at the top of your player character's die determines what your current ability is; combat, stealth, and mobility are all tied to these different faces

Post-jam next steps/what I would do if I had more time:

  • Music & SFX
  • Improved graphics, most of the sprites are temp art
  • Additional levels: most of the levels currently in the build are the tutorial levels, intended to teach the concept, and there aren't any puzzles that truly test the knowledge of the mechanics

Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2022 (Roll of the Dice)
